'''Mythcon 34''' was the thirty-fourth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "From Athena to Galadriel: The Image of the Wise Woman in Mythopoeic Fiction"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Dabney A. Hart (C.S. Lewis scholar) and Sherwood Smith (fantasy author)
*'''Chairman:''' Ruby Dunlap and Mary Stolzenbach
